# Home v2 with King Composer

Home v2 of Pizzaro is built using **King Composer**.It has 8 rows. The **King Composer** Backend editor of the page look like this

![](http://transvelo.github.io/docs/pizzaro/images/kc-home-v2.png)

## The Code

Please switch your editor to classic mode and paste the code given here :

